description: MANDATORY output structure for smart follow-up agent decisions. You must always provide your reasoning and follow-up decision.

action.description: The follow-up action to take based on conversation analysis

next_call_time.description: ISO 8601 timestamp for when the next follow-up should be scheduled. Required for send/skip/suggest actions, must be null for remove action.

messages.description: Array of message strings to send to the customer. Required for send/suggest actions, empty array for skip/remove actions.

items.description: Message content to send to the customer

chain_of_thought.description: REQUIRED: Your reasoning process and decision explanation

trigger.description: Type of event triggering this follow-up decision

trigger_id.description: ID of the smart follow-up workflow triggering this evaluation

chain_of_thought.description: Your detailed reasoning explaining why you chose this follow-up action, considering conversation context, timing, and strategy objectives

title.description: Short preview title summarizing your follow-up decision (e.g., 'Sending 2nd follow-up on proposal', 'Skipping - customer needs time')
